verses.name: Revelation 7:12
verses.text: Saying, Amen: Blessing, and glory, and wisdom, and thanksgiving, and honour, and power, and might, be unto our God for ever and ever. Amen.

verses.name: Revelation 7:13
verses.text: And one of the elders answered, saying unto me, What are these which are arrayed in white robes? and whence came they?

verses.name: Revelation 7:14
verses.text: And I said unto him, Sir, thou knowest. And he said to me, These are they which came out of great tribulation, and have washed their robes, and made them white in the blood of the Lamb.
